00004 include_once('CMErrorType.php');

00024 class CMError implements CMClass {
00025  
00029  private $errorStack = array();
00030  
00034  private $verboseLevel = CMErrorType::Warning;
00035  
00041  private static $GlobalStack = false;
00042  
00050  private $exitLevel = CMErrorType::Fatal;
00051  
00060  public function setExitLevel($exitLevel = CMErrorType::Fatal) {
00061   $this->$exitLevel = $exitLevel;
00062   return true;
00063  }
00064  
00071  public function errors($level = CMErrorType::Warning) {
00072   // check global stack
00073   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00074    return CMError::$GlobalStack->errors();
00075   
00076   if(is_array($this->errorStack)) {
00077    // create a new stack of filtered errors
00078    $r = array();
00079    foreach($this->errorStack as $e) {
00080     if($e['_type'] >= $level)
00081      array_push($r, $e);
00082    }
00083    
00084    return $r;
00085   } return $this->errorStack->errorStack;
00086  }
00087  
00096  public function isErrors($level = CMErrorType::Warning) {
00097   // check global stack
00098   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00099    return CMError::$GlobalStack->isErrors();
00100   
00101   if(is_array($this->errorStack)) {
00102    // count filtered errors
00103    $r = 0;
00104    foreach($this->errorStack as $e) {
00105     if($e['_type'] >= $level)
00106      ++$r;
00107    }
00108    return $r > 0;
00109   }
00110   
00111   return $this->errorStack->isErrors();
00112  }
00113  
00121  public function countErrors($level = CMErrorType::Warning) {
00122   // check global stack
00123   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00124    return CMError::$GlobalStack->countErrors();
00125   
00126   if(is_array($this->errorStack)) {
00127    // count filtered errors
00128    $r = 0;
00129    foreach($this->errorStack as $e) {
00130     if($e['_type'] >= $level)
00131      ++$r;
00132    }
00133    
00134    return $r;
00135   }
00136   
00137   return $this->errorStack->countErrors();
00138  }
00139  
00148  public function dealtWithAll() {
00149   // check global stack
00150   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00151    return CMError::$GlobalStack->dealtWithAll();
00152   
00153   if(is_array($this->errorStack))
00154    $this->errorStack = array();
00155   else $this->errorStack->dealtWithAll();
00156   return true;
00157  }
00158  
00172  public static function PrintBackTrace($error) {
00173   for($i = 3; $bt = $error['_backtrace'][$i]; ++$i) {
00174    echo "  ", $bt['file'], ": line ", $bt['line'], ": ";
00175    if($bt['class'] != "")
00176     echo $bt['class'], "::";
00177    echo $bt['function'], "()\n";
00178   }
00179   return true;
00180  }
00181  
00195  public static function PrintError($error) {
00196   echo "Reason: ", $error['_reason'], "\n";
00197   CMError::PrintBackTrace($error);
00198  }
00199  
00208  private function pushError($type, $attr) {
00209   // check global stack
00210   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00211    return CMError::$GlobalStack->pushError($type, $attr);
00212   
00213   if(is_array($this->errorStack)) {
00214    $toStack = array(
00215     '_type' => $type,
00216     '_backtrace' => debug_backtrace()
00217    );
00218    foreach($attr as $k => $v)
00219     $toStack[$k] = $v;
00220     
00221    array_push($this->errorStack, $toStack);
00222   } else $this->errorStack->pushError($type, $attr);
00223   
00224   return false;
00225  }
00226  
00237  public function throwGeneric($type, $msg, array $attr = array()) {
00238   // if this is a fatal error, exit the script
00239   if($type === CMErrorType::Fatal)
00240    die($msg);
00241    
00242   // print the message
00243   if($msg != "") {
00244    if(is_array($this->errorStack) && $type >= $this->verboseLevel)
00245     echo $msg, "\n";
00246    else if($this->errorStack instanceof CMError && $type >= $this->errorStack->verboseLevel)
00247     echo $msg, "\n";
00248   }
00249   
00250   // push the error onto the stack
00251   $attr['_reason'] = $msg;
00252   $this->pushError($type, $attr);
00253   
00254   return false;
00255  }
00256  
00267  public function throwDebug($msg, $attr = array()) {
00268   return $this->throwGeneric(CMErrorType::Debug, $msg, $attr);
00269  }
00270  
00281  public function throwNotice($msg, $attr = array()) {
00282   return $this->throwGeneric(CMErrorType::Notice, $msg, $attr);
00283  }
00284  
00295  public function throwWarning($msg, $attr = array()) {
00296   return $this->throwGeneric(CMErrorType::Warning, $msg, $attr);
00297  }

00309  public function throwDeprecated($msg, $attr = array()) {
00310   return $this->throwGeneric(CMErrorType::Deprecated, $msg, $attr);
00311  }

00323  public function throwUnavailable($msg, $attr = array()) {
00324   return $this->throwGeneric(CMErrorType::Unavailable, $msg, $attr);
00325  }

00337  public function throwError($msg, $attr = array()) {
00338   return $this->throwGeneric(CMErrorType::Error, $msg, $attr);
00339  }

00351  public function throwException($msg, $attr = array()) {

00353  }

00378  public function setVerboseLevel($verboseLevel) {
00379   $this->verboseLevel = $verboseLevel;
00380   return true;

00399  public function useErrorStack($newStack) {
00400   // reset
00401   if($newStack === NULL || $newStack === false) {
00402    $this->errorStack = array();
00403    return true;
00404   }
00405   
00406   // must be a CMError
00407   if($newStack instanceof CMError) {
00408    $this->errorStack = $newStack;
00409    return true;
00410   }
00411   
00412   // failed
00413   return false;
00414  }
00415  
00428  public static function SetGlobalStack($newStack) {
00429   // reset
00430   if($newStack === NULL || $newStack === false) {
00431    CMError::$GlobalStack = false;
00432    return true;
00433   }
00434   
00435   // must be a CMError
00436   if($newStack instanceof CMError) {
00437    // the new stacks actual stack must be an array to stop possible infinite loops
00438    if(!is_array($newStack->errorStack))
00439     $newStack->errorStack = array();
00440     
00441    CMError::$GlobalStack = $newStack;
00442    return true;
00443   }
00444   
00445   // failed
00446   return false;
00447  }
00448  
00456  public function printAllErrors() {
00457   // loop through the stack
00458   foreach($this->errorStack as $e) {
00459    CMError::PrintError($e);
00460    echo "\n";
00461   }
00462   return false;
00463  }
00464  
00468  public function __toString() {
00469   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00470  }
00471  
00472 }
